name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu stores electricity in its cheeks and releases it in powerful bursts. It is often seen playing in forests and is known for its loyalty.
tasks: Find Pikachu in a thunderstorm area.
Use a volt-absorbing trap to gain trust.
Win a speed trial mini-game to prove your agility.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander has a flame that burns at the tip of its tail. The flame's size and brightness reflect its emotions.
tasks: Feed spicy berries to build trust.
